page.title: 09History of Moreton
page.content: {A change but not for better.}In the last half century,Moreton has changed considerably.In a few decades a tiny village has become a sprawling residential outlet.The main rd. 60 years ago was just a narrow lane surrounded by fields and farms and a few huts.Moreton was very remote and isolated from Wallasey and Birkenhead. In 1928 Wallasey's boundaries took Moreton under its municipal wing building council estates and new roads .Those who have known Moreton from the old days miss the wide open spaces and the small friendly village atmosphere and one cannot doubt that the old peop le remember the better times of Moreton.The village of Greasby has als changed.Once just afew cottages and farms,rapid growth in the 1970s, has given the village an urban character.
